analysis.description:
GPower.icoAddress (/unique_chucks/9/0x9464e7d6dc5e8f34d162f3ca190d788f8ce8cc13.sol#176-177) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x9464e7d6dc5e8f34d162f3ca190d788f8ce8cc13.sol#220-255)

GPower.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/9/0x9464e7d6dc5e8f34d162f3ca190d788f8ce8cc13.sol#292-297) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x9464e7d6dc5e8f34d162f3ca190d788f8ce8cc13.sol#294-297)

GPower.icoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x9464e7d6dc5e8f34d162f3ca190d788f8ce8cc13.sol#176-177)
